data.title: Historic St George's United Methodist Church
data.meta_site_name: Historic St George's United Methodist Church
data.text:
Welcome to America’s oldest, continually used United Methodist Church!

Experience history, tradition, and inspiration in the cradle of American Methodism; a place of worship since 1769.

All are welcome. Historic St. George’s is a reconciling and LGBTQI+ affirming United Methodist Church.

Through objects, paintings and documents, you will be transported to the start of the Methodist denomination. The HSG museum and archives are open 9AM to 3PM, Tuesday - Thursday, or by appointment . Saturday group tours are available by appointment only (Free Will offering, please, for booked tours). Any use of archive materials must be booked in advance with the Collections Manager, Kate Nolan (kate@historicstgeorges.org).

Time Traveler, an immersive program and tour, explores our Methodist Heritage. This program is perfect for confirmation classes, young adults, new members, or just-plain-curious folk.
